title: Remove Yasuo's windwall and give it to Janna as her ultimate
body:
https://66.media.tumblr.com/25c766be48583c0d78f81a8ca8f3d3a8/tumblr_p2cr0kgtix1v6txq2o1_500.png

Yasuo is cancerous but to make him less cancerous remove his immunity to ranged abilities and give him like an attack speed steroid or some shit 

Give Windwall to Janna, who is a Wind Goddess and should have it,  and either make it her ultimate 

If you don't want to make it her ultimate, have it replace her w
